si.title: වහාම බලධාරීන් පිළිබඳ තොරතුරු ලබා දෙන්න - ජනාධිපති

en.title: Immediately provide information about the authorities - the President

summary_lines: The President is the head of state and government in many countries, responsible for implementing and enforcing laws passed by the legislature. They often serve as the commander-in-chief of the military and represent the nation internationally.
